    SpawnNpcCommand
    The type Spawn npc command.
    SpawnViolentNpcCommand
    Command to create and manage violent NPCs with WorldEdit-style selection Selection Commands: /npc violent pos1 - Set first position of spawn area at player location /npc violent pos2 - Set second position of spawn area at player location /npc violent selection - View current selection /npc violent clearsel - Clear current selection NPC Management: /npc violent create - Create new violent NPC with current selection /npc violent setarea - Update spawn area for NPC using current selection /npc violent setstats - Set NPC stats /npc violent setcount - Set max spawn count /npc violent setrespawn - Set respawn delay /npc violent spawn - Force spawn the NPC /npc violent despawn - Despawn all entities for NPC /npc violent list - List all violent NPCs /npc violent remove - Remove a violent NPC
